quote: Open houses, social media, and first-time homebuyer seminars were my key strategies for rapid growth.
why_clipworthy: Provides a clear, actionable strategy for new agents to generate leads.
suggested_hook: Looking to jumpstart your real estate career? Here's how I did it!

quote: I worked part-time in real estate while maintaining a full-time job until I could transition fully.
why_clipworthy: Encourages new agents who feel they can't start without going full-time.
suggested_hook: Think you can't start real estate part-time? Think again!
